name: Funny Catcher
description:
Play now and get a chance to crush the oncoming monsters. They're smarter than you think!

🍭Choose one of two characters!

🍭Test your reaction and attention! Don't let them collide with each other!

🍭Earn coins and use them to get cool super powers!

🍭Go through the levels with your family and friends to find out the winner!

 

Gameplay:

- Tap the monster to catch it before it starts growing.

- Don't let the monsters collide, otherwise you will lose.

- Complete levels and complete tasks.

- Collect stars and unlock super powers that will help you complete levels and make the game more fun.

- Plan ahead - which monster to catch next and do not rush to clear the level until the task is completed.

Feature of game: 

- Funny Catcher - a game that can be played without the Internet. Play anywhere at any time, no Wi-Fi connection required!

- Simple and fun gameplay.

- 27 levels in the main mode. Complete everything to open the infinite.

- Download now and play for free!

- Rating of the best players. Prove that you are the best by getting a foothold in the international ranking of the best players.

- Achievement system.

Catching as many bizarre monsters as possible is much more difficult than it seems at first glance! See for yourself!

Download the game now to enjoy new experiences!

***

Funny Catcher is a free game, but some in-game features can be purchased for real money.

An Internet connection is required for ratings and achievements to work in the game.

Subscribe to the Funny Catcher Facebook page to stay up to date with the latest updates:
